query.statement:
SELECT DISTINCT(C.TM_NM) AS TEAM_NAME, REPLACE(B.UPJANGNM,'단체급식 ') AS SAUPJANG_NM ,A.REAL_IN_DATE AS Y_DATE FROM HLDC_FS_VOC_MASTER A, HLDC_ST_UPJANG B, HLDC_SC_DEPT_V C WHERE A.SAUPJANG = TO_CHAR(B.UPJANG) AND B.DEPT_ID = C.DEPT_ID AND A.REAL_IN_DATE BETWEEN #SDATE# AND #EDATE#
AND A.TEAM = #TEAM#
AND A.SAUPJANG = #SAUPJANG#
